data.content: My first internet product with a subscription type, this application only focuses on cash flow, both from recording income, expenses, budgeting and reporting every month. This application is equipped with a feature to scan grocery receipts and find out your income or expenses.

I rebuilt the insurance broker system from scratch again, because the old system could not be maintained well. The broker system that I created only rebuilt the existing system and helps brokers in cross-checking data from bank to insurance and vice versa.

I built a ticketing & raffle system from scratch on the Karcisbola application, including a payment gateway, but the ticketing system is not yet fully used. I also researched many clouds to reduce costs in terms of deployment, both staging and production.

The first time I worked at this company, I played the role of Backend Developer, this company operates in the Software House sector for private and government companies. with the many applications created, I developed many skills learned, both from the Backend, Frontend and DevOps side.

The development of an application using the sprint method, the task that is carried out becomes more neat and directed. I also explore various programming languages. and I build a coding standard that is used in the office, especially for projects and products.

I joined this community at the end of 2017. I learned a lot here from versioning with git, learning coding with case studies, and managing a project in the field. And now I manage this community both in terms of websites and participants who want to learn together.
